summary: Adds two new swords, Luusi and Fuer.
descriptionHtml:
The Twin Blades of Light mod adds two new swords, Luusi and Fuer. 

Weapon Description: Holy flames burn Undead and Demonic targets for 30 points. Wielder is granted Holy Sight. 

Both swords must be equipped at the same time for the effects to work. Resistance or weakness to fire do not effect Holy Flames. Holy Sight allows vision in the dark. The swords can be found in the Temple of Mara in Riften. 

I am open for suggestions or comments. Enjoy!
author: DeanCarter
